content-model-abstractwiki: The label used when describing the page contents for the Abstract Content content.
wikilambda-abstract-content-object: Label shown at the top of the Abstract Content object editor.
wikilambda-abstract-edit-title:
Title for the page for editing the Abstract Article of a given Wikidata Item Id.

Parameters:
* $1 - Wikidata Item Id and title of the Abstract Wikipedia content page.
wikilambda-abstract-fragment-actions-men: Accessible label for the menu button that provides actions for a fragment (move, insert, delete) in the Abstract Content editor.
wikilambda-abstract-invalidcontent: Error shown when an invalid Abstract Content definition edit is made.
wikilambda-abstract-invalidcontenttitle:
Error shown when a user tries to create an Abstract Content object with an invalid title.

Parameters:
* $1 - The given, invalid title.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-fragments-acces: Accessible label for the menu button for selecting and adding a new fragment
wikilambda-abstract-menu-group-basic-fra: Text for the Abstract Fragment menu group with actions to add basic fragments.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-group-insert-fr: Text for the Abstract Fragment menu group with actions to insert new fragments at different positions.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-group-move-frag: Text for the Abstract Fragment menu group with actions to move fragments to different positions.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-group-special-f: Text for the Abstract Fragment menu group with actions to add fragments given by configured functions that return HTML.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-option-add-empt: Label for the menu option to add a new empty fragment
wikilambda-abstract-menu-option-add-name:
Label for the menu option to add a new fragment given by a function name

Parameters:
* $1 - Name of the function to add.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-option-delete-f: Label for the menu option to delete the selected fragment.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-option-insert-a: Label for the menu option to insert a fragment below the selected one.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-option-insert-b: Label for the menu option to insert a fragment above the selected one.
wikilambda-abstract-menu-option-move-aft: Label for the menu option to move the selected fragment one position below
wikilambda-abstract-menu-option-move-bef: Label for the menu option to move the selected fragment one position above.
wikilambda-abstract-preview-in-language:
Label for the preview of the Abstract Article rendered into a user-specified language.

Parameters:
* $1 - The name of the specified language for the auto-article in the user's language.
wikilambda-abstract-special-create: Title for the Special page to create a new Abstract Article
wikilambda-abstract-special-create-creat: Label for the button to create a new Abstract Article on the Special:CreateAbstract page.
wikilambda-abstract-special-create-exist: Warning message to users who try to create an Abstract Article about an existing topic. The next line following the colon is the label and QID of the Abstract Article, as a link.
wikilambda-abstract-special-create-intro:
Intro text for the Special page to create a new Abstract Article.

Parameters:
* $1 - link to the community rules page, hard-coded for now to Special:MyLanguage/Abstract:List_of_policies_and_guidelines.
wikilambda-abstract-special-create-not-e: Intro text for the Special page to create a new Abstract Article when the feature is not enabled.
Title for the Special page to create a new Abstract Article when the feature is not enabled.
wikilambda-abstract-special-create-qid:
Title for the Special page to create a new Abstract Article for a given Wikidata Item Id.

Parameters:
* $1 - Wikidata Item Id and title of the Abstract Wikipedia content page.
wikilambda-abstract-special-view: Title for the Special page to view an Abstract Article
